tool_description: Generates personalized customer notifications for package tracking updates, delivery exceptions, and status changes across multiple communication channels.

notification_type.description: Type of notification (shipped, in_transit, out_for_delivery, delivered, exception)

include_tracking_link.description: Whether to include tracking link in notification

error_messages: Invalid customer ID: Customer ID must be alphanumeric and 6-20 characters.
Invalid tracking number: Tracking number format is not recognized.
Unknown notification type: Must be one of: shipped, in_transit, out_for_delivery, delivered, exception.
Empty customer preferences: At least one communication preference must be specified.
Invalid delivery date format: Date must be in ISO 8601 format.
Invalid urgency level: Must be one of: low, normal, high.
Missing exception details: Exception details required for exception notification type.
usage: Provide customer_id, tracking_number, notification_type, current_status, and customer_preferences to generate appropriate notifications. Include optional parameters for more detailed and personalized messages.

notification_messages.description: Generated notification messages for different channels

delivery_channels.description: Communication channels to use (email, sms, push, etc.)

message_priority.description: Message priority level for delivery system
